Small Tabs Styleguide

Styleguide

Elements

Elements are the foundation of the system. Simply using typography and color, well designed Elements can begin to express the site's personality.

  • Color Palette
  • Typography

Components

Elements are combined and modified to create components. Components are designed to serve specific functional roles within the system.

  • Contact list
  • Day of the Week list
  • Featured Bar
  • Finder
  • Listing Rollup
  • Map
  • Nearby Bars list
  • Promote Your Bar block
  • Recently Added block
  • Recently Updated block
  • Site Footer
  • Site Header
  • Tag list

Templates

Based on the needs of the content, Components are arranged into specific layouts to create Templates.

  • Bar Page › Displays location, special and contact information content for a single bar.
  • Find a Bar Page › Something about this template is it cool because this and because of that. Only put this type of content on this template you dumb denny.
  • General Page › Something about this template is it cool because this and because of that. Only put this type of content on this template you dumb denny.
  • Home Page › Something about this template is it cool because this and because of that. Only put this type of content on this template you dumb denny.
  • Taxonomy Page ›
